meanings.definition: in a manner characteristic of a clerk
meanings.sent1: She organized the files clerkliest, just like a professional clerk.
meanings.sent2: He typed the report clerkliest, following the office procedures precisely.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the clerkliest behavior by sitting on the keyboard.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so neat, it looked clerkliest on the page.
meanings.sent5: The way he greeted customers was clerkliest, making them feel welcome.

meanings.definition: resembling or characteristic of a clerk
meanings.sent1: The neat and organized desk was the clerkliest in the entire office.
meanings.sent2: She had a clerkliest outfit on, complete with a name tag and pen in her pocket.
meanings.sent3: The dog's behavior was so clerkliest, it seemed like it was waiting to be paid.
meanings.sent4: The old typewriter had a clerkliest charm to it, reminding people of a bygone era.
meanings.sent5: His handwriting was the clerkliest of all, with each letter perfectly formed.
